org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.layer.unit

Interface UnitController<D extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage,DB extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage.Builder<DB>>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - the data type of this unit used for the state synchronization.
    DB - the builder used to build the unit data instance.
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.openbase.jul.iface.Activatable, org.openbase.jul.iface.Changeable, org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.ConfigProvider<rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Configurable<String,rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.pattern.Controller<D>, org.openbase.jul.extension.protobuf.iface.DataBuilderProvider<D,DB>, org.openbase.jul.pattern.provider.DataProvider<D>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Identifiable<String>, org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.LabelProvider, org.openbase.jul.extension.protobuf.MessageController<D,DB>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Pingable, org.openbase.jul.iface.Requestable<D>, org.openbase.jul.extension.rst.iface.ScopeProvider, Service, ServiceProvider, org.openbase.jul.iface.Shutdownable, org.openbase.jul.iface.Snapshotable<rst.domotic.action.SnapshotType.Snapshot>, Unit<D>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BaseUnitController<D,DB>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
